meanings.definition: Reversed in position, order, or relationship.
meanings.sent1: The inversed puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The inversed colors created a striking contrast.
meanings.sent3: She wore an inversed outfit to the costume party, with her shirt worn inside out.
meanings.sent4: The inversed map made it challenging to navigate the unfamiliar terrain.
meanings.sent5: The inversed pattern on the fabric caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To reverse the order or position of something.
meanings.sent1: He inversed the order of the books on the shelf for a new look.
meanings.sent2: The magician inversed the cards to perform a trick.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully inversed the dessert by serving it first.
meanings.sent4: She inversed the usual route to explore a different path.
meanings.sent5: The artist inversed the colors to create a unique painting.

meanings.definition: To turn inside out or upside down.
meanings.sent1: She inversed her umbrella to shake off the rainwater.
meanings.sent2: The tornado inversed everything in its path.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy inversed the trash can looking for treats.
meanings.sent4: His decision inversed the expected outcome of the game.
meanings.sent5: The acrobat skillfully inversed her body during the performance.
